title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: lightweight, extensible framework for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma & other LLMs locally with a single CLI or REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, list, delete models with async support.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node & browsers; same API surface as the Python client.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLM or chat backend.

title: ollama-webui (formerly ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web UI for any Ollama model; plugins, RAG, multi-user, Docker one-liner.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; sync/async, streaming, POJO model mapping, Android compatible.

title: ollama-cli (rust)
summary: Rust crate providing typed async client & CLI for Ollama; generate, chat, pull, list.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into inline GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-chatbot (Streamlit)
summary: Streamlit chatbot template that talks to Ollama; session memory, Docker, one-click deploy.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Ready-to-run RAG pipeline using Ollama + Chroma + LangChain; ingest PDFs, query via CLI.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that answers via any Ollama model; slash commands, thread support.

title: ollama-nvidia-trt
summary: Experimental PR adding TensorRT-LLM backend to Ollama for faster NVIDIA inference.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node-selector & PVC support.

title: ollama-models
summary: Community-curated Modelfile library (Llama 3, Phi-3, Starling etc.) ready to pull.

title: ollama-gui (Flutter)
summary: Cross-platform desktop/mobile GUI for Ollama built with Flutter; chat, model manager.

title: ollama-express
summary: Express.js middleware that proxies OpenAI-compatible endpoints to Ollama; drop-in replacement.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds AI assistant sidebar powered by any local Ollama model.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot server (Go) that answers channel mentions using Ollama; ephemeral thread mode.

title: ollama-powershell
summary: PowerShell module wrapping Ollama REST API; cmdlets for chat, generate, model ops.
